crystal_of_time.name: Crystal of Time
description: A crystal from Ylarus, God of Time,

key_honeywood_basement.name: Basement key
description: Key given to you by the elder himself.

scroll_of_orc_obedience.name: Scroll of Orc Obedience
description: Makes an orc follow your command unconditionally.
Only works when fairies are near.

horse_medicine.name: Horse Medicine
description: A medicine made by Elenora for Enopa.

tow_rope.name: Tow Rope
description: A strong rope which can be used by a horse.
